comments.raw_text: Currently we store a WindowStateHolder* as an nsISupports* in nsISHEntry. Would be much nicer to explicitly use the right type there, to avoid casts and so forth.
comments.text: Currently we store a WindowStateHolder* as an nsISupports* in nsISHEntry. Would be much nicer to explicitly use the right type there, to avoid casts and so forth.
